context: Underground mining operation evaluating autonomous haulage system implementation

request.purpose: Deploy autonomous haulage trucks and supporting infrastructure to reduce workplace accidents
request.justification: 40% reduction in haulage accidents, improved productivity, worker safety enhancement

decision_process.outcome: Safety improvements validated with regulatory approval
Technology selected with comprehensive implementation plan
Workforce transition plan developed with union agreement

business_impact.expected_outcome: Safer work environment, increased productivity, reduced insurance costs

lessons_learned: Comprehensive workforce consultation essential, phased implementation reduces risk
